text: Kit Connor (born 8 March 2004) is an English actor most notable for his appearances as Tom in Get Santa and as a young Elton John in Rocketman. == Career == Kit Connor started his acting career aged 8 in the TV series Chickens and had several supporting roles before getting the lead in Get Santa in the same year as getting his first long term appearance in TV in Rocket's Island. Connor has since taken several roles in other film and TV productions including Slaughterhouse Rulez and War & Peace and The Mercy.
